name: ValleySpeak
tag_list: microsoft-project-server, microsoft-project-viewer, ms-project-viewer, microsoft-project-reader, web-based-project-management-software, microsoft-project-sharing
overview:
Free Microsoft Project Viewer: Now ValleySpeak is available for free. FREE For 3 users for ever.

ValleySpeak Project Server is a web based Project Management Software, used to publish the projects, tasks and issues in real time. Project server allows the managers to continue to use their Microsoft Project for managing and scheduling the tasks, projects, issues, risks, with their team members.

Features : Project server which is available both as on demand as well as on site model, works along with the microsoft project and it allows access for the team to update Microsoft Project schedules also a 100% two way integration. It includes collaborative tools such as Calendar Management, Timesheet Management, Issue Tracking, Risk Management, Document Management, Discussion Forums, Project Portfolio Dashboard, Integrated Project Reporting and Outlook integration.
